Class userInterface

A class which wraps all 500px REST user end node functions

Jerry Fan

Method Detail

delete_users_id_friends

public JSONObject delete_users_id_friends(java.lang.String id)
500px DELETE_users_id_friends. Removes the user from the list of followers.

Parameters:
id - (required) Ñ ID of the User to remove from the followers list.
Returns:
JSON response. See 500px API for details.

get_users

public JSONObject get_users()
500px GET_users. Returns the profile information for the current user.

Returns:
JSON response. See 500px API for details.

Remark: Requires OAuth authentication.

get_usersEx

public get_users_response get_usersEx()
500px GET_users. Returns the profile information for the current user in an already parsed JSON response object. Since 500px is constantly upgrading its API response format. So this version may contain less return key/value pairs than get_photo.

Returns:
get_users_response object. See 500px API for details.

Remark: Requires OAuth authentication.

get_users_id_followersEx

public get_users_id_followers_response get_users_id_followersEx(java.lang.String id,
                                                                int page,
                                                                int rpp)
500px GET_users_id_followers. Returns a list of users who follow the specified user in an already parsed JSON response object.

Parameters:
id - (required) Ñ ID of the user.
page - Return the specified page of the resource. Page numbering is 1-based.
rpp - Results Per Page, default 20, max 100.
Returns:
get_users_id_followers_response object. See 500px API for details.

                                       int page,

Parameters:
id - (required) Ñ Return information for the specified user ID
page - Return the specified page of the resource. Page numbering is 1-based.
rpp - Results Per Page, default 20, max 100.

JSON response. See 500px API for details.

get_users_search

public JSONObject get_users_search(java.lang.String search)
500px GET_users_search. Return listing of ten (up to one hundred) users from search results for a specified search term.

Parameters:
search - (required) Ñ A keyword to search for.
Returns:
JSON response. See 500px API for details.

get_users_search_response object. See 500px API for details.

get_users_show_by_id

public JSONObject get_users_show_by_id(java.lang.String id)
500px GET_users_show. Returns the profile information for a specified user by userid (don't be confused this with username where userid is a number).

Parameters:
id - (required) user to return from with specific user id.
Returns:
JSON response. See 500px API for details.
